FROM member a INNER JOIN memberUploaded b ON b.pseq = a.seq WHERE a.user_type = 26 AND b.type = 2 AND b.defaultNy = 1 AND ifcgDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND ifcgSeq = #{shValue} AND ifcgName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifcgNameEng LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select: SELECT * ,b.path ,b.uuidName FROM member a JOIN memberUploaded b WHERE 1=1 AND b.defaultNy = 1 AND b.type = 2 AND b.pseq = #{seq} AND a.seq = #{seq}
SELECT type ,url FROM actor_sns WHERE 1=1 AND member_seq = #{seq}
SELECT period ,type ,producer ,name ,role FROM actor_filmography WHERE 1=1 AND member_seq = #{seq}
SELECT period_s ,period_e ,school_name ,major ,type FROM actor_education WHERE 1=1 AND member_seq = #{seq}
SELECT period ,name ,issuer FROM actor_award WHERE 1=1 AND member_seq = #{seq}
